title: The Rex Reilly Show
description: Rex Reilly speaks with unique people with interesting stories to tell. Includes classic episodes like My Pet Saved My Life, I Look Like Joyce DeWitt, and People Who Fight Too Much.
quote: I slept with her. I slept with my mom.
alt3: woman who looks like Joyce DeWitt excited to meet Joyce DeWitt
alt4: Rex Reilly sitting awkwardly next to a fat woman
